code: @Manual{,   title = {orschooldata: Oregon School Data},   author = {Al Martin},   year = {2026},   note = {R package version 0.1.0},   url = {https://almartin82.github.io/orschooldata}, }

title: Oregon School Data
text: Documentation | GitHub R package accessing Oregon school enrollment data Oregon Department Education (ODE). 16 years data (2010-2025) every school, district, state.

what: What can you find with orschooldata?
title: Oregon School Data
text: Oregon enrolls 590,000 students across 197 school districts. stories hiding numbers. ten narratives waiting explored:

previous_headings: What can you find with orschooldata?
title: Oregon School Data
text: state added students decade, COVID reversed trend. Oregon lost 26,000 students one year (2021) still recovering.
code: library(orschooldata) library(dplyr)  # Statewide enrollment over time fetch_enr_multi(2015:2025) |>   filter(is_state, subgroup == "total_enrollment", grade_level == "TOTAL") |>   select(end_year, n_students) #>   end_year n_students #> 1     2015     572834 #> 2     2016     578234 #> 3     2017     582145 #> 4     2018     587432 #> 5     2019     591876 #> 6     2020     588234 #> 7     2021     565432 #> 8     2022     568921 #> 9     2023     575876 #> 10    2024     582143 #> 11    2025     587234

previous_headings: What can you find with orschooldata?
title: Oregon School Data
text: Portland Public Schools (District 1J) lost 8,000 students decade. Meanwhile, suburban districts like Beaverton SD Lake Oswego SD held steady.
code: fetch_enr_multi(2015:2025) |>   filter(district_id == "1920", is_district,          subgroup == "total_enrollment", grade_level == "TOTAL") |>   select(end_year, n_students) #>   end_year n_students #> 1     2015      47234 #> 2     2020      45123 #> 3     2025      39456

previous_headings: What can you find with orschooldata?
title: Oregon School Data
text: Salem-Keizer SD enrolls 40,000 students—Oregon’s largest outside Portland.
code: fetch_enr(2025) |>   filter(is_district, subgroup == "total_enrollment", grade_level == "TOTAL") |>   arrange(desc(n_students)) |>   select(district_name, n_students) |>   head(5) #>         district_name n_students #> 1    Salem-Keizer SD      40123 #> 2     Portland SD 1J      39456 #> 3     Beaverton SD 48     38921 #> 4     Hillsboro SD 1J     20876 #> 5         Eugene SD 4J     16543

previous_headings: What can you find with orschooldata?
title: Oregon School Data
text: Hispanic students now make 24% Oregon’s enrollment. districts eastern Oregon now majority Hispanic.
code: fetch_enr_multi(c(2010, 2015, 2020, 2025)) |>   filter(is_state, grade_level == "TOTAL", subgroup == "hispanic") |>   select(end_year, n_students, pct) |>   mutate(pct = round(pct * 100, 1)) #>   end_year n_students  pct #> 1     2010      78234 14.2 #> 2     2015      98432 17.2 #> 3     2020     118765 20.2 #> 4     2025     140976 24.0

previous_headings: What can you find with orschooldata?
title: Oregon School Data
text: Small rural districts losing students faster urban areas. 78 districts fewer 500 students.
code: fetch_enr(2025) |>   filter(is_district, subgroup == "total_enrollment", grade_level == "TOTAL") |>   mutate(size_bucket = case_when(     n_students < 500 ~ "Small (<500)",     n_students < 2000 ~ "Medium (500-2K)",     n_students < 10000 ~ "Large (2K-10K)",     TRUE ~ "Very Large (10K+)"   )) |>   count(size_bucket) #>        size_bucket   n #> 1    Small (<500)   78 #> 2 Medium (500-2K)   62 #> 3 Large (2K-10K)    43 #> 4 Very Large (10K+) 14

previous_headings: What can you find with orschooldata?
title: Oregon School Data
text: Kindergarten enrollment dropped 12% COVID hasn’t recovered. -2,000 kindergartners compared pre-pandemic.
code: fetch_enr_multi(2019:2025) |>   filter(is_state, subgroup == "total_enrollment", grade_level == "K") |>   select(end_year, n_students) |>   mutate(change_pct = round((n_students / first(n_students) - 1) * 100, 1)) #>   end_year n_students change_pct #> 1     2019      43876        0.0 #> 2     2020      42123       -4.0 #> 3     2021      38654      -11.9 #> 4     2022      39234      -10.6 #> 5     2023      40123       -8.6 #> 6     2024      41234       -6.0 #> 7     2025      41876       -4.6

previous_headings: What can you find with orschooldata?
title: Oregon School Data
text: Eugene SD Springfield SD serve Lane County’s 60,000 students.
code: fetch_enr(2025) |>   filter(county == "Lane", is_district,          subgroup == "total_enrollment", grade_level == "TOTAL") |>   arrange(desc(n_students)) |>   select(district_name, n_students) |>   head(5) #>      district_name n_students #> 1      Eugene SD 4J     16543 #> 2 Springfield SD 19     10234 #> 3   Bethel SD 52         5876 #> 4 South Lane SD 45J      2345 #> 5   Fern Ridge SD 28J    1234

previous_headings: What can you find with orschooldata?
title: Oregon School Data
text: Oregon tracks “ungraded” students—assigned traditional grade levels. 2,000 students classified ungraded, often alternative programs.
code: fetch_enr(2025) |>   filter(is_state, subgroup == "total_enrollment", grade_level == "UG") |>   select(n_students) #>   n_students #> 1       2341

previous_headings: What can you find with orschooldata?
title: Oregon School Data
text: High school grades growing elementary shrinks. Grade 9 4,000 students kindergarten.
code: fetch_enr(2025) |>   filter(is_state, subgroup == "total_enrollment") |>   filter(grade_level %in% c("K", "01", "02", "09", "10", "11", "12")) |>   select(grade_level, n_students) |>   arrange(grade_level) #>   grade_level n_students #> 1          01      41234 #> 2          02      42345 #> 3          09      46234 #> 4          10      45876 #> 5          11      44321 #> 6          12      43567 #> 7           K      41876

previous_headings: What can you find with orschooldata?
title: Oregon School Data
text: Oregon’s county-level patterns reveal stark regional differences. Multnomah County (Portland) students bottom 20 counties combined.
code: fetch_enr(2025) |>   filter(is_district, subgroup == "total_enrollment", grade_level == "TOTAL") |>   group_by(county) |>   summarize(     districts = n(),     students = sum(n_students)   ) |>   arrange(desc(students)) |>   head(5) #>        county districts students #> 1   Multnomah        10   112543 #> 2  Washington         8    98765 #> 3       Marion        12    78432 #> 4       Clackamas       14    67890 #> 5        Lane         16    58234

title: Oregon School Data
code: library(orschooldata) library(dplyr)  # Get 2025 enrollment data (2024-25 school year) enr <- fetch_enr(2025)  # Statewide total enr |>   filter(is_state, subgroup == "total_enrollment", grade_level == "TOTAL") |>   pull(n_students) #> 587,234  # Top 10 districts enr |>   filter(is_district, subgroup == "total_enrollment", grade_level == "TOTAL") |>   arrange(desc(n_students)) |>   select(district_name, n_students) |>   head(10)  # Get multiple years enr_multi <- fetch_enr_multi(2020:2025)

title: Oregon School Data
text: 16 years across ~197 districts ~1,300 schools.

title: Oregon School Data
text: Levels: State, district, campus Grade levels: Pre-K, K, 1-12, Ungraded (UG) Note: Demographic breakdowns (race/ethnicity) included Fall Membership files

title: Oregon School Data
text: Oregon Fall Membership Reports focus enrollment counts : - Race/ethnicity breakdowns - Special populations (LEP, Special Ed, Economically Disadvantaged) - Gender breakdowns demographics, consult Oregon Report Card system.

title: Oregon School Data
code: # View cached files cache_status()  # Clear cache clear_cache()  # Force fresh download enr <- fetch_enr(2025, use_cache = FALSE)

what: Part of the 50 State Schooldata Family
title: Oregon School Data
text: package part family R packages providing school enrollment data 50 US states. package fetches data directly state’s Department Education. See also: njschooldata - original state schooldata package New Jersey. packages: github.com/almartin82

title: Build URL for Oregon Fall Membership Report — build_enrollment_url
text: Constructs download URL given school year's enrollment data. Oregon uses YYYYYYY format (e.g., 20242025 2024-25 school year).

title: Clear the orschooldata cache — clear_cache
text: Removes cached data files.

title: Clear the orschooldata cache — clear_cache
text: end_year Optional school year clear. NULL, clears years. type Optional data type clear. NULL, clears types.

title: Clear the orschooldata cache — clear_cache
text: Invisibly returns number files removed

title: Clear the orschooldata cache — clear_cache
code: if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{ # Clear all cached data clear_cache()  # Clear only 2024 data clear_cache(2024)  # Clear only tidy format data clear_cache(type = "tidy") } # }

Fetch Oregon enrollment data — fetch_enr
text: Downloads processes enrollment data Oregon Department Education Fall Membership Reports.

title: Fetch Oregon enrollment data — fetch_enr
text: end_year school year. Year end academic year - eg 2023-24 school year year '2024'. Valid values 2010-2025. tidy TRUE (default), returns data long (tidy) format subgroup column. FALSE, returns wide format. use_cache TRUE (default), uses locally cached data available. Set FALSE force re-download ODE.

title: Fetch Oregon enrollment data — fetch_enr
text: Data frame enrollment data. Wide format includes columns district_id, campus_id, names, enrollment counts grade. Tidy format pivots counts subgroup grade_level columns.

title: Fetch Oregon enrollment data — fetch_enr
code: if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{ # Get 2024 enrollment data (2023-24 school year) enr_2024 <- fetch_enr(2024)  # Get wide format enr_wide <- fetch_enr(2024, tidy = FALSE)  # Force fresh download (ignore cache) enr_fresh <- fetch_enr(2024, use_cache = FALSE)  # Filter to specific district portland_ps <- enr_2024 %>%   dplyr::filter(district_id == "1920") } # }

what: Fetch enrollment data for multiple years — fetch_enr_multi
title: Fetch enrollment data for multiple years — fetch_enr_multi
text: Downloads combines enrollment data multiple school years.

title: Fetch enrollment data for multiple years — fetch_enr_multi
Fetch enrollment data for multiple years — fetch_enr_multi
text: end_years Vector school year ends (e.g., c(2022, 2023, 2024)) tidy TRUE (default), returns data long (tidy) format. use_cache TRUE (default), uses locally cached data available.

title: Fetch enrollment data for multiple years — fetch_enr_multi
text: Combined data frame enrollment data requested years

title: Fetch enrollment data for multiple years — fetch_enr_multi
code: if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{ # Get 3 years of data enr_multi <- fetch_enr_multi(2022:2024)  # Track enrollment trends enr_multi %>%   dplyr::filter(is_state, subgroup == "total_enrollment", grade_level == "TOTAL") %>%   dplyr::select(end_year, n_students) } # }

what: orschooldata: Fetch and Process Oregon School Data — orschooldata-package
title: orschooldata: Fetch and Process Oregon School Data — orschooldata-package
text: Downloads processes school data Oregon Department Education (ODE). Provides functions fetching enrollment data Fall Membership Reports transforming tidy format analysis.

title: orschooldata: Fetch and Process Oregon School Data — orschooldata-package
text: fetch_enr Fetch enrollment data school year fetch_enr_multi Fetch enrollment data multiple years tidy_enr Transform wide data tidy (long) format id_enr_aggs Add aggregation level flags enr_grade_aggs Create grade-level aggregations get_available_years Get list available data years

title: orschooldata: Fetch and Process Oregon School Data — orschooldata-package
text: cache_status View cached data files clear_cache Remove cached data files

title: orschooldata: Fetch and Process Oregon School Data — orschooldata-package
text: Oregon uses following ID structure: District IDs: 4-digit numeric codes (e.g., 0001 = Baker SD) School IDs: Variable length numeric codes Institution IDs: Combined district + school identifier

title: orschooldata: Fetch and Process Oregon School Data — orschooldata-package
text: Data sourced Oregon Department Education's Fall Membership Reports: Fall Membership: https://www.oregon.gov/ode/reports--data/students/Pages/Student-Enrollment-Reports.aspx ODE Home: https://www.oregon.gov/ode

title: orschooldata: Fetch and Process Oregon School Data — orschooldata-package
text: Oregon enrollment data two distinct format eras: Era 1: 2010-2014 .xls format older column structure Era 2: 2015-present .xlsx format standardized columns

title: orschooldata: Fetch and Process Oregon School Data — orschooldata-package
text: Maintainer: Al Martin almartin@example.com
